title: 09/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/21/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin is unimpressed with the Packers after their bounce back win over the Lions and what it says about quarterback Aaron Rodgers. He discusses Tom Brady’s unparalleled success and how he’s becoming the most famous football player of all time. He shares his Herd Hierarchy through 2 weeks of the NFL season. Plus, FOX Sports NFL analyst Mark Sanchez joins the show to tell Colin if the Bears should start rookie QB Justin Fields and why Zach Wilson struggled so much against Bill Belichick and the Patriots.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
